name: surface-average
author: Connectome Workbench Developers
description:
Average surface files together.

The 3D sample standard deviation is computed as 'sqrt(sum(squaredlength(xyz - mean(xyz)))/(n - 1))'.

Uncertainty is a legacy measure used in caret5, and is computed as 'sum(length(xyz - mean(xyz)))/n'.

When weights are used, the 3D sample standard deviation treats them as reliability weights.

inputs.name: opt_stddev_stddev_metric_out
inputs.description: compute 3D sample standard deviation: the output metric for 3D sample standard deviation

inputs.name: opt_uncertainty_uncert_metric_out
inputs.description: compute caret5 'uncertainty': the output metric for uncertainty

inputs.name: surf
inputs.description: specify a surface to include in the average

type.name: surf
type.description: specify a surface to include in the average

inputs.name: opt_weight_weight
inputs.description: specify a weighted average: the weight to use (default 1)

output-files.name: opt_stddev_stddev_metric_out
output-files.description: compute 3D sample standard deviation: the output metric for 3D sample standard deviation

output-files.name: opt_uncertainty_uncert_metric_out
output-files.description: compute caret5 'uncertainty': the output metric for uncertainty
